description: User requests flood‑plain‑free single‑family homes in Tampa, FL; the assistant searches MLS listings, checks zoning to exclude flood‑plain properties, calculates ROI for the remaining homes, and delivers a detailed markdown investment report.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. Use the available tools to find properties, verify zoning, calculate ROI, and generate investment reports for the user.
I’m looking for single‑family homes in Tampa, FL, priced between $200k and $500k, at least 2 bedrooms, that are NOT in a flood‑plain. Show me the best options and give me ROI estimates.
Sure, I’ll start by searching the MLS for properties that match your price, bedroom, and location criteria.

{"listings":[{"price":250000,"size_sqft":1500,"address":"1234 Oak St, Tampa, FL 33602","url":"https://mls.example.com/1234oak","beds":3,"baths":2,"property_type":"single_family"},{"price":320000,"size_sqft":1800,"address":"5678 Pine Ave, Tampa, FL 33607","url":"https://mls.example.com/5678pine","beds":4,"baths":3,"property_type":"single_family"},{"price":210000,"size_sqft":1300,"address":"9012 Maple Blvd, Tampa, FL 33612","url":"https://mls.example.com/9012maple","beds":2,"baths":2,"property_type":"single_family"},{"price":450000,"size_sqft":2200,"address":"3456 Cedar Ln, Tampa, FL 33634","url":"https://mls.example.com/3456cedar","beds":5,"baths":4,"property_type":"single_family"}]}
I’ll now check the zoning and flood‑plain status for each listing to keep only those that are not in a flood‑plain.
{"address":"1234 Oak St, Tampa, FL 33602","zoning_class":"Residential Single Family","flood_zone":"No Flood"}
{"address":"5678 Pine Ave, Tampa, FL 33607","zoning_class":"Residential Single Family","flood_zone":"No Flood"}
{"address":"9012 Maple Blvd, Tampa, FL 33612","zoning_class":"Residential Single Family","flood_zone":"Flood Zone AE"}
{"address":"3456 Cedar Ln, Tampa, FL 33634","zoning_class":"Residential Single Family","flood_zone":"No Flood"}
Great – three of the four listings are outside a flood‑plain (1234 Oak St, 5678 Pine Ave, and 3456 Cedar Ln). I’ll calculate ROI for each of those properties.
{"annual_cash_flow":15600,"cash_on_cash_return":0.12,"cap_rate":0.07}
{"annual_cash_flow":19440,"cash_on_cash_return":0.13,"cap_rate":0.08}
{"annual_cash_flow":25800,"cash_on_cash_return":0.14,"cap_rate":0.09}
Now I’ll pull a quick market‑trend snapshot for Tampa and some school information for each area, then compile everything into a polished investment report.
{"median_sale_price":280000,"price_per_sqft":190,"vacancy_rate":0.045}
{"schools":[{"name":"Oak Elementary School","rating":8,"distance_miles":0.9,"type":"Public"},{"name":"West Tampa High School","rating":7,"distance_miles":2.1,"type":"Public"}]}
{"schools":[{"name":"Pine Middle School","rating":9,"distance_miles":1.2,"type":"Public"},{"name":"South Tampa Charter","rating":8,"distance_miles":2.5,"type":"Charter"}]}
{"schools":[{"name":"Cedar High School","rating":7,"distance_miles":1.8,"type":"Public"},{"name":"Cedar Academy","rating":9,"distance_miles":2.2,"type":"Private"}]}

**Summary**
This property offers a solid cash‑on‑cash return, sits outside any flood‑plain, and is near well‑rated schools, making it attractive for both rental income and family buyers.
